title: master.css
content: /* @ global settings */ html,body{height:100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust: none} body{font-family:'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;color:#315317;text-rendering:optimizelegibility;background:#f7f7f7} *{margin:0;padding:0} img,fieldset{border:none} a,a:link,a:visited{color:#315317;text-decoration:none;outline:none} a:hover{color:#315317} p{font-size:14px;color: #315317;line-height:19px} p a{color:#315317 !important} /* end global settings */ h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,strong,b { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-weight: normal; } .read-more {white-space: nowrap} a.read-more:hover {text-decoration: underline} #header-inner,#footer-inner,#header-top div,.bottom-inner,#content { max-width: 996px; min-width: 300px; margin: 0 auto; } #header { width: 100%; padding-bottom: 10px; margin-bottom: 38px; float: left; clear: left; background: #fff; } #header.header-home { padding-bottom: 20px; margin-bottom: 0; } #header.header-home #main-nav {padding-bottom: 0} #header.header-home #logo {margin-bottom: 0} #header-top { font-size: 11px; color: #fff; background: #516e14; padding: 5px 0 3px; } #header-top a {color: #fff} #header-top #lang-selector { text-align: right; position: relative; z-index: 999; } #header-top #lang-selector a {font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif} #header-top #lang-selector .lang { color: #fff; background: #739417; top: 15px; right: -5px; position: absolute; padding: 4px 5px 5px; display: none; } .contact-us-mobile {display: none} #header-inner,.header-top-inner {padding: 0 3%} #logo { background: url(../images/logo.gif) no-repeat; height: 86px; width: 173px; margin: 21px 0 20px 0; float: left; display: block; } #search-field { padding: 45px 0 15px; float: right; } #search-field div { border: 1px solid #ccc; -webkit-border-radius: 12px; -moz-border-radius: 12px; border-radius: 12px; -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px #eee; -moz-box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px #eee; box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px #eee; float: left; } #search-field input.text { font-family: Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 12px; width: 92px; height: 21px; margin-left: 8px; padding-right: 5px; border: none; float: left; background: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; } #search-field input.text:focus {outline: none} #search-field input.submit { background: url(../images/search.gif) no-repeat left center; border: none; width: 20px; height: 20px; cursor: pointer; float: left; } #main-nav,#iphone-nav {padding-bottom: 20px} #main-nav,#subnav-landscape,#iphone-nav { float: right; clear: right; } #subnav-landscape { padding-bottom: 20px; display: none; } #main-nav li,#subnav-landscape li,#iphone-nav li { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 15px; white-space: nowrap; list-style: none; border-right: 1px solid #315317; margin-right: 8px; padding-right: 8px; float: left; } #subnav-landscape li {font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif} #main-nav li:last-child,#subnav-landscape li:last-child,#iphone-nav li:last-child { border-right: none; margin-right: 0; padding-right: 0; } .toggle-menu {display: none} #main-nav li a,#iphone-nav li a { padding-top: 2px; display: block; } #main-nav li a:hover,#main-nav li.active a,#iphone-nav li a:hover,#iphone-nav li.active a {color: #315317} #main-nav li.active a{color: #739417} #iphone-nav {display: none} .width25 {width: 25%} .width50 {width: 50%} .float {float: left} div.slogan { width: 100%; background: #eee; float: left; clear: left; } div.slogan p { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Regu',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 30px; color: #5d902d; line-height: normal !important; max-width: 996px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 1.7% 3% 2.5%; } div.slogan p strong { color: #000 } /* content */ #content {padding: 3%} #home-content { width: 100%; clear: left; background: #fff; border-top: 1px solid #bed3ab; position: relative; } #home-content .shadow-top { background: #eee url(../images/home-shadow.gif) repeat-x left top; height: 2px; width: 100%; position: relative; z-index: 99; } #home-content .shadow-bottom { background: #eee url(../images/home-shadow.gif) repeat-x left bottom; height: 6px; width: 100%; float: left; position: relative; z-index: 99; } #home-content .left { color: #fff; background: #739417; width: 48.19277108433735%; padding: 4.6% 0 15% 0; float: left; position: relative; z-index: 10; } #home-content .left p { color: #fff; } #home-content .left h2 { font-size: 24px; padding-bottom: 2%; } #home-content .left a.read-more,#home-content .right a.read-more { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #abd036; float: right; } #home-content .right a.read-more {color: #5d902d} #home-content .left .text { width: 89%; margin-bottom: 20%; } #home-content .left .services .service { width: 94%; padding-right: 6%; float: left; } #home-content .left .services .service h3 { font-size: 20px; margin-bottom: 2px; } #home-content .left .services .service p { float: left; } #home-content .left .services .service .icon { max-width: 106px; width: 22.08333333333333%; padding-bottom: 11%; float: left; } #home-content .left .services .service .icon img { width: 100%; } #home-content .left .services .service .text { width: 71.91666666666667%; padding-left: 4%; float: left; } #home-content .right { color: #5d902d; background: #fff; width: 47.30722891566265%; padding: 4.6% 0 0 4.5%; float: left; position: relative; z-index: 10; } #home-content .right h2 { font-size: 24px; padding-bottom: 2%; } #home-content .right p { color: #5d902d; } #home-content .right .element { width: 100%; border-top: 1px solid #bed3ab; padding-top: 22px; float: left; clear: left; } #home-content .right .element:first-child {border: none;} #home-content .right .text { max-width: 420px; } #home-content .right .small-text { font-size: 12px; max-width: 188px; margin: 12% 0 0 36%; } #home-content .right .small-text img { width: 78.873239436619718%; margin-bottom: 9%; } #home-content .right .small-text h4 { font-size: 12px; padding-bottom: 7px; } #home-content .right .small-text p { font-size: 12px; line-height: 19px; } #home-content .right .small-text a.read-more { font-size: 12px; color: #5d902d !important; } .home-content-inner { max-width: 996px; padding: 0 3%; margin: 0 auto; } #home-content .left-bg { background: #739417; width: 40%; height: 100%; top: 0; left: 0; position: absolute; z-index: 0; } #home-content .right-bg { background: #fff; width: 30%; height: 100%; top: 0; right: 0; position: absolute; z-index: 0; } #home-botton { width: 100%; padding: 1% 0 0.7% 0; background: #eee; float: left; clear: left; } #news-home { width: 100%; color: #5f5f5f; float: left; } .new-home-inner { max-width: 996px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 3%; } #news-home h2 { font-size: 20px; width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } #news-home h2 a {color: #5f5f5f} #news-home h2 a:hover {text-decoration: none} #news-home .column { width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } #news-home .column span {font-size: 11px} #news-home .column h4 {font-size: 14px} #news-home .column h4 a { color: #5f5f5f; width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } #news-home .column article { padding-bottom: 5%; float: left; clear: left; } #news-home a:hover {text-decoration: underline} #video-home { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 22px; float: left; clear: left; } #video-home-inner { width: 100%; } #video-home .video { width: 61.9047619047619%; margin-right: 7%; position: relative; float: left; } #video-home .video a {display: block;} #video-home .video img { width: 100%; height: auto; border: 1px solid #dcdcdc; float: left; } #video-home .video span.play-video { height: 100%; width: 100%; padding: 0; background: url(../images/play-button.png) no-repeat 50% 50%; display: block; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; } #video-home .text { width: 30.95238095238095%; float: left; } #video-home .text span.date { font-size: 12px; line-height: 19px; color: #5F5F5F; width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } #video-home .text h4 { font-size: 14px; color: #5F5F5F; margin-bottom: 3%; width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } #video-home .text a.play { font-size: 12px; font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; } #video-home .text a {color: #5F5F5F} #video-home .text a:hover {text-decoration: underline} .three-columns,.two-columns,.four-columns { width: 100%; padding: 0 0 30px 0; float: left; } .two-columns .column { width: 47.274%; margin-left: 5.4%; float: left; } .two-columns-home .item {width: 46.08%} .three-columns .column { width: 31.0509333333333%; margin-left: 3.4%; float: left; } .four-columns .column { width: 21.199%; margin-left: 5%; float: left; } .four-columns-home .item {width: 21.1%} .three-columns .column.column_1,.two-columns .column.column_1,.four-columns .column.column_1 {margin-left: 0} .three-columns .column img,.two-columns .column img,.three-columns .column img,.four-columns .column img { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 10px; float: left; } .three-columns .column h5,.two-columns .column h5,.four-columns .column h5, .column h5 a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: #739417; padding-bottom: 5px; } .three-columns .column h5 strong,.two-columns .column h5 strong,.four-columns .column h5 strong,.column h5 strong a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-weight: normal; color: #000; } .three-columns .column p,.two-columns .column p,.four-columns .column p,#main-content .column p a {color: #3e3d40 !important;padding: 0 !important;text-decoration: none !important} #content {padding: 3%} #sidebar { width: 22%; padding-right: 3%; float: left; } .sidebar-panel { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 20px; background: #fff; border: 1px solid #e6e6e6; -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; -moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; float: left; clear: left; -ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Shadow(Strength=4, Direction=135, Color='#e2e3e3')"; filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Shadow(Strength=4, Direction=135, Color='#e2e3e3'); } .sidebar-panel h5 { font-size: 14px; color: #739417; border-bottom: 1px solid #e6e6e6; padding: 5% 5.2% 4.5%; } .sidebar-panel h5 a {color: #739417} .sidebar-panel p,.sidebar-panel ul { font-size: 13px; color: #000; padding: 5% 5.2%; } .sidebar-panel ul li { list-style-position: inside; line-height: 19px; } .sidebar-panel p a {color: #000 !important} .sidebar-panel .play-video { background: #739417; padding: 6%; float: left; clear: left; } *+ html .sidebar-panel .play-video {width: 88%} .sidebar-panel .play-video .video-screenshot { width: 45%; margin-right: 5%; float: left; display: block; } .sidebar-panel .play-video img { width: 100%; float: left; } .sidebar-panel .play-video p { font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; width: 45%; padding: 0; margin-bottom: 14px; color: #fff; float: left; } .sidebar-panel .play-video a.play { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; color: #fff; text-decoration: underline; width: 45%; float: left; } #sidebar a.pdf { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 12px; width: 97.6%; margin: 15px 1.2%; float: left; clear: left; background: url(../images/download-icon.gif) no-repeat left top; padding-left: 17px; } #sidebar a.pdf:hover {text-decoration: underline} .sidebar-panel .contact-panel {padding: 5.2% 0} .sidebar-panel .contact-panel p { padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; } .sidebar-panel .contact-panel p a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #315317 !important; } .sidebar-panel .contact-panel p a:hover {text-decoration: underline} .download-sidebar { padding-bottom: 15px; } .sidebar-image { width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } .sidebar-image img { width: 100%; float: left; } .sidebar-image span { font-size: 12px; color: black; padding: 5% 5.2% 10%; display: block; float: left; clear: left; } .sidebar-video { padding-bottom: 4.5%; display: block; position: relative; } .sidebar-video span.play-button { height: 93%; width: 100%; padding: 0; background: url(../images/play-button.png) no-repeat 50% 50%; display: block; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; } #subnav { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 130%; background: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #e6e6e6; border-top: none; -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; -moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; -ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Shadow(Strength=4, Direction=135, Color='#e2e3e3')"; filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Shadow(Strength=4, Direction=135, Color='#e2e3e3'); float: left; } #subnav li { font-size: 14px; list-style: none; border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6; } #subnav li a { color: #000; padding: 4.5% 5%; display: block; position: relative; } #subnav li.active a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #739417; background: #fff; } #subnav li.active span { background: url(../images/active-arrow.gif) no-repeat left center; width: 8px; height: 100%; display: block; position: absolute; right: -8px; top: 0; } #subnav li li.active a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif !important; color: #739417 !important; background: #fff !important; } #subnav li a:hover {background: #fff !important} #subnav li li a { font-size: 13px; padding-left: 15%; background: #fbfbfb !important; } #subnav li li li a {padding-left: 30%} #subnav li li li li a {padding-left: 45%} #subnav li.active li.active li a { font-family:'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif !important; color: #000 !important; background: #fbfbfb !important; } #subnav li.active li.active li.active a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif !important; color: #739417 !important; background: #fff !important; } #subnav li.active li a { font-family:'LinotypeUniversW01-Ligh 723631',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #000; } #main-content { width: 75%; background: #fff; -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; -moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; -ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Shadow(Strength=4, Direction=135, Color='#e2e3e3')"; filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Shadow(Strength=4, Direction=135, Color='#e2e3e3'); float: right; } .main-content-inner { border: 1px solid #e6e6e6; } .main-content-inner .space { width: 93.2%; padding: 3.4%; float: left; clear: left; } .main-content-inner ul { font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; line-height: 19px; width: 97%; margin-bottom: 19px; padding-left: 3%; float: left; clear: left; } .page-headline { width: 100%; padding: 0 0 4.5%; position: relative; float: left; clear: left; } .page-headline h3,.page-headline h4 { font-size: 17px; line-height: 19px; } .page-headline h3 {color: #000} .page-headline h4 {color: #739417} .content-headline { background: url(../images/headline-shadow.gif) repeat-x left bottom; float: left; width: 100%; padding-bottom: 5px; margin-bottom: 1.5%; } .content-headline-inner { max-width: 996px; padding: 1.7% 3% 2.1% 0; margin: 0 auto; position: relative; } .content-headline hgroup { width: 90%; margin-left: 2.2%; float: left; } .content-headline h1 { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Regu',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 34px; color: #739417; padding-bottom: 0.8%; margin-left: 1%; } .content-headline-inner .date { font-size: 14px; color: #3E3D40; margin-left: 1%; } .content-headline h2 { font-size: 16px; color: #000; margin-left: 1%; } .content-headline .headline-icon { width: 9.45%; position: absolute; right: 2.5%; top: 7%; } .content-headline a.rss { height: 37px; width: 38px; background: url(../images/rss.gif); position: absolute; right: 1.28%; top: 6%; } #main-content p { color: #3e3d40; width: 100%; padding: 0 0 19px; float: left; clear: left; } #main-content p a {text-decoration: underline !important} .description-list { border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6; width: 100%; padding-top: 3.5%; margin-bottom: 19px; float: left; clear: left; } .description-list .column { width: 45.8%; padding-left: 4.2%; float: left; } .description-list .column.left { padding: 0 4.2% 0 0; float: left; } .faq-list { border: 1px solid #e6e6e6; -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; -moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; box-shadow: 2px 2px 4px #e2e3e3; width: 99.8%; margin-bottom: 2.5%; float: left; clear: left; } .faq-list header { width: 100%; padding: 1.2% 0%; } .faq-list header h5 { font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; padding-left: 2%; float: left; } .faq-list header a.view-all { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #739417; padding-right: 2%; float: right; } .faq-list ul { background: #f5f5f5; border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6; padding: 1.2% 0; width: 100%; } .faq-list li { font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; list-style: none; padding: 0 2%; margin-bottom: 7px; float: left; clear: left; } .teaser { border: 1px solid #fff; margin-bottom: -1.5%; position: relative; } .teaser img { width: 100%; float: left; } .teaser .overlay { background: #739417; position: absolute; width: 30%; padding: 2.5% 2.5% 1.35% 2.5%; top: 8.2%; left: 1.7%; } .teaser .overlay h1 { font-size: 16px; color: #fff; line-height: 16px; border-bottom: 1px solid #fff; padding-bottom: 6%; margin-bottom: 3%; } .teaser .overlay span { font-size: 11px; color: #fff; width: 100%; display: block; } #map_canvas { width: 100%; height: 355px; margin: 0 0 19px; } .content-row { width: 100%; padding: 3.5% 0 4.5%; border-top: 1px solid #e6e6e6; float: left; } .content-row .text { width: 45%; padding-right: 8.5%; float: left; } .content-row .text h5 { font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; line-height: 19px; } .content-row .text h5 a {color: #3e3d40} .content-row .text p { padding-bottom: 0 !important; } .content-row .text .read-more { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #739224; white-space: nowrap; float: right; } .content-row img { width: 41.4%; float: left; } #main-content div.note { background: #739417; width: 100%; margin-bottom: 22px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #bbb; -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #bbb; box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #bbb; float: left; clear: left; } #main-content div.note p { width: auto; color: #fff; padding: 1.7% 1.4% 1.9%; } #main-content div.note a { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #fff !important; text-decoration: underline; } .definition-list { width: 100%; float: left; clear: left; } .definition-list dt { font-size: 16px; color: #739417; width: 23%; padding: 13px 2% 6% 0; border-top: 1px solid #e7e7e7; float: left; clear: left; } .definition-list dt strong {color: #000} .definition-list dd { width: 75%; padding: 13px 0 6%; border-top: 1px solid #e7e7e7; float: left; } #main-content .definition-list dd p { padding-left: 3.1%; border-left: 1px solid #e7e7e7; } #main-content .definition-list dd ul { padding-left: 6.3%; padding-bottom: 19px; margin: 0; border-left: 1px solid #e7e7e7; } #main-content .definition-list dd ul ul { list-style: disc; padding: 19px 0 0 3.1%; border: none; } #main-content .definition-list dd p a {text-decoration: underline} p.quote { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 22px; padding: 0 !important; background: #f7f7f7; -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #bbb; -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #bbb; box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #bbb; float: left; clear: left; } .quote q { font-size: 14px; font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Bold 723697',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #000; line-height: 22px; margin: 2.3% 2% 5px 2%; width: 96%; float: left; clear: left; } .quote span { font-size: 12px; color: #000; width: 96%; margin: 0 2% 0 2%; padding-bottom: 2%; float: left; clear: left; } .sevices-list { margin: 1.5% 0 1.5% 0 !important; float: left; } .sevices-list li { width: 45%; padding: 0 5% 5% 0; list-style: none; float: left; } .sevices-list li img { width: 31.67%; margin-right: 4%; float: left; } .sevices-list li .text { width: 63%; padding-top: 3%; float: left; } .sevices-list li h5 { font-size: 14px; color: #3e3d40; line-height: 19px; } .full-image { width: 100%; padding: 0 0 19px; float: left; clear: left; } .full-image img {width: 100%} a#contact-us { background: url(../images/contact-us.png) no-repeat; width: 45px; height: 122px; display: block; position: fixed; text-indent: -99999em; overflow: hidden; left: -4px; top: 35%; z-index: 999; } a#contact-us:hover {text-decoration: none} #contact { background: #fff; max-width: 580px; } #contact .contact-headline { padding: 2.5% 0 2% 4.2%; background: #f7f7f7; } #contact .contact-headline h1 { font-family: 'LinotypeUniversW01-Regu',Univers,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-size: 34px; color: #739324; } #contact .contact-headline h2 { font-size: 16px; color: #000; } label.error {color: red !important} .placeholder { font-style: italic; color: darkGray; } #contact textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder {font-style: italic} #contact textarea:-moz-placeholder {font-style: italic} #contact textarea:-ms-input-placeholder {font-style: italic} #news-overview,#main-content ul#search-result { width: 100%; padding-top: 7px; } #news-overview article,#search-result li { width: 100%; padding-bottom: 36px; float: left; clear: left; } #search-result li {list-style: none} .main-content-inner ul#search-result {margin-left: 0} .main-content-inner ul#search-result a {color: #3e3d40 !important} #news-overview .date,#search-result .date { font-size: 12px; padding-bottom: 1px; float: left; clear: left; } #main-content #news-overview p a,#main-content #search-result p a {text-decoration: none !important} #news-overview h4,#search-result h4 { font-size: 14px; float: left; clear: left; } #news-overview p,#search-result p {padding-bottom: 3px} #search-result p strong .content-slideshow a.prev,.orbit-wrapper a.prev { background: url(../images/slideshow-nav.png) no-repeat left top; left: 1.2%; } .content-slideshow a.next,.orbit-wrapper a.next { background:
